title: Strange Boy
alternative_title: Fushigi na Shounen ; ふしぎな少年 ; The Mysterious Boy
status: Fushigi na Shounen ; ふしぎな少年 ; The Mysterious Boy
description:
Description :
        Saburo Onishi (or "Sabutan") wanders into a four-dimensional world through a crack in the wall of a underground road under construction. There he gains the ability to stop time. He decides to use this ability to help people.---**Volumes 56 and 57 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
